entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 21 except 13 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 21 except 13 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18 except 12 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near noon. High 18 except 12 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
